Reviews.Content: stayed hotel pensione marsala 10 days trip explore rome budget conscious travelers late 50s 70s dont spend time roomwe busy breaking bank pleasantly surprised marsala location greata perfect base sightseeing trains buses metro depart termini hotel literally street termini station marsala exit station top floor 2 floor top floor nice little balcony overlooking via marsala tv fridge safe bathroom breakfast included fineno gourmet experience fine dined various venues lunch dinner laundry nearby desk staff pleasant cleaned daily fresh towels arrived rome 8pm tired express train fiumicino airport walked hotel station simple previous trip rome stayed 4 star hotel 2 star marsala cost location nearly convenient beds hard 4 star 2 star hotels exhausted day activitiy little getting sleep

Reviews.Content: € 154 nights bookingcom nice top floor spacious clean refrigerator bathroom spotless complete bidet soap provided kept cool hardly noise towels changed daily top floor view busy street quiet night breakfast coffee cornflakes milk sweet ofcourse location termini station sightseeing metro perfect
